refnamediv.refpurpose: get the protocol version of a connection.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: SSL_get_version() returns the name of the protocol used for the connection ssl.

refsection.title: RETURN VALUES
refsection.para: The following strings can be returned:

listitem.para: The connection uses the SSLv3 protocol.
The connection uses the TLSv1.0 protocol.
The connection uses the TLSv1.1 protocol.
The connection uses the TLSv1.2 protocol.
This indicates that no version has been set (no connection established).
